data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: This too shall pass.

data.author: Albert Einstein
data.quote: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.

data.author: Winston Churchill
data.quote: If you are going through hell, keep going.

data.author: Robert Heilein
data.quote: There's no free lunch.

data.author: Pablo Picasso
data.quote: Everything you can imagine is real.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: I'm my problem but also my solution.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: Can't move mountains? Try small stones.

data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
data.quote: Do what you feel right, for you'll be criticised anyway.

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Don't wish it were easier. Wish you were better.

data.author: Henry Ford
data.quote: Vision without execution is just hallucination.

data.author: Anonymous
data.quote: The moment you realize that you know nothing, you'll know everything.

data.author: Oscar Wilde
data.quote: Be yourself. Everyone else is already taken.

data.author: Gerard Butler
data.quote: Be the hero of your own life story

data.author: Jim Rohn
data.quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.

data.author: Chris Grosser
data.quote: Opportunities don't happen, you create them.

data.author: Confucius
data.quote: It does not matter how slowly you go, so long as you do not stop.

data.author: Spryte Loriano
data.quote: Every great story on the planet happened when someone decided not to give up, and kept going no matter what.

data.author: Charles Darwin
data.quote: A man who dares to waste one hour of time has not discovered the value of life.

data.author: Leonardo DiCaprio
data.quote: If you can do what you do best and be happy, you're further along in life than most people.

data.author: Aristotle
data.quote: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.
